Name: Theresa
description:
Theresa wants to thank her Kiva lenders for their support with her previous loan, which enabled her to purchase additional goods for her general store business.

She has paid off her loan and requested a new loan to pay for trays, foils , and baby seaweed to grow for her food marketing business to earn additional income.

She will use her profits to meet her family's financial needs and grow her business.
